thread.title: WATCH: New characters in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' trailer
thread.title_full: WATCH: New characters in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' trailer

author: Rappler.com
title: WATCH: New characters in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' trailer
text:
WATCH: New characters in 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' trailer Yondu, Nebula, and Mantis join the Guardians in this new teaser trailer Published 9:40 AM, February 06, 2017 Updated 9:40 AM, February 06, 2017 VOLUME 2. Nebula, Yondu, and Mantis join Star-Lord and the gang in 'Guardians of The Galaxy Vol.2' Screengrab from YouTube/Marvel Entertainment 
  A new trailer for Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 debuted during the Super Bowl on Sunday, February 5 (Monday, February 6 in Manila), and with it came a look at some new characters. ( WATCH: First 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' trailer released ) 
In the action-packed trailer, we see our heroes â€“ Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and of course, the adorable Baby Groot, fighting the bad guys. 
But they aren't alone for this adventure. Fans get a glimpse of new characters Yondu, Mantis, and Nebula too, who are set to help out the Guardians in this sequel. 
Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2 hits theaters on May 5 in the US.
